en.av_c1: Let's look at an efficient way to build the heap. We are going to make a max-heap from a set of input values.
en.av_c2: Working from bottom to top, from right to left, do a siftdown on each internal node.
en.av_c4: Since it has smaller value than its children, swap it with its larger child.
en.av_c7: 2 is done. Now let's do the node with value 1.
en.av_c10: Now we have a max heap.
